attributes.action: Reduce the deadly pollution rates in London
attributes.additional_details: We have 11 years to save our planet, our future. Why is the government not panicking?
attributes.background: Pollution rates in London are now at an all time high and are massively contributing to the increase of climate change. As well as this, Londoners are developing breathing problems and long lasting coughs.  This air is poisoning our people and something needs to change soon.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518
